scripts.ins:db: mvn -pl=tigase-server exec:java -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 -Dexec.mainClass="tigase.util.DBSchemaLoader"  -Dexec.args="-dbHostname 127.0.0.1 -dbType mysql -schemaVersion 7-1 -dbName tigasedb -rootUser root -rootPass 123456 -dbUser tigase -dbPass 123456 -logLevel ALL -file tigase-server/database/mysql-schema-7-1.sql"
